title: Loot Crafting History or (New!) function
body:
Hi,

I opened a chest and while it opened I joined a game. After the game ended I didn't see what I got from the chest. After looking around the forums it seems it was likely an icon and some Orange essence. 

Is there anyway I can see which icon I got via crafting history somewhere? It would be kinda nice to have a "new" label on new loot, that disappears when you hover over it.

Kind regards,
Bob

replies.body: Hey, it should be available in your client store's purchase history.  Just to confirm it looks like you got 150 Orange Essence and a PROJECT: Ekko Icon.  Grats!

Ah I forgot to look at the purchase history, thanks for clearing this up. 

Have a great day
